The current sketch is not saved, would you like to save it?

Some required fields are empty. Specify the missing information.
The Work Order will be removed from this list.
This work order has not been sent to the server. Do you want to delete it?
Stop the timer on work order {0} before you start the timer on this work order.
The labor timer for this work order is running. Do you want to complete the work order?
The labor timer for work order {0} is running. Do you want to cancel the work order?
The labor timer for task {0} of work order {1} is running. Do you want to complete the work order?
The labor timer for task {0} of work order {1} is running. Do you want to cancel the work order?
The labor timer for activity {0}, a task of work order {1} is running. Do you want to complete the work order?
The labor timer for activity {0}, a task of work order {1}, is running. The labor transaction will be deleted if you cancel the work order. Do you want to cancel the work order?
The Labor, Craft, Skill Level, Vendor and Contract combination selected does not match data currently on the device. Do you want to continue?
The asset is in location {0}. Replace the current location with location {1}? If you do not want to update the current asset, click Close.
The specified asset does not have a location. Clear the current location? If you do not want to update the current asset, click Close.
The specified location does not match the location of asset {0}. Clear the current asset? If you do not want to update the current location, click Close.
Changes that have not been sent to the server will be discarded.

All the dynamic check points have not been entered. You can either click Cancel and enter all the dynamic check points before setting the status of the work order to closed or complete, or you can select OK to continue with the status change without entering all the dynamic check points.

text.label: Scheduled Start Date Range
text.placeHolder: Tap to enter start date range
Tap to enter end date range

whereClause.clause: spi:worksite=${worksite} and spi:orgid=${orgid} and spi:vendor=${vendor} and spi:status in [${domaincrewstatus[maxvalue=ACTIVE].value}]

message.defaultMessage: Work Order
Work Orders
The end time cannot be earlier than the start time. Specify a later time.
Specify the date when the work was started.
The start date cannot be earlier than the last status change date.
The end date cannot be earlier than the last status change date.
The value for hours is greater than the duration between the start time and the end time. Correct the value for hours.
The labor transaction cannot be saved.
A default craft record for the labor code must be defined. Contact your administrator.
The labor record was not found. A labor record for this person must be defined on the enterprise system.
The work order cannot be saved.
The work order was not found.
The timer has been started on a work order that is not shown in this work list. Switch to the other work list and stop the timer on that work order first.
